module.name: Google Search
module.description: Allows one to search Google and have the results displayed within ATutor.

release.notes: See the developers guide for details https://developers.google.com/web-search/docs/?hl=en. This serch replaces the previous search that required a Google key to operate. As a result there are no admin config optiions, so the admin google search page has been removed from ATutor.
